title: Angel 6.0 (The Box Set): Dark Sci-Fi Romance
features: Enslaved as concubine to an alien warlord. Coveted by an alien prince. Lover to a pirate captain. 500+ pages of steamy scifi reverse harem romance from a NY Times bestseller! Save 40% on the price of all 5 books in this limited offer box set.Genetically engineered perfect. Enslaved as concubine. Angel is taken captive, rescued, and stolen again. Can her pirate lover save her from enslavement as concubine to an alien warlord?

Born of illegal genetic experimentation, I’ve been abducted and enslaved as concubine to alien Cats. I’m trapped on a Gran jumpship, racing across the galaxy. They think I'm some kind of upgrade, a new slave stock to be bred.

A clone created to perfect the human genome, the doctor says I could be the savior of the human race... if I can escape the Gran, ferocious alien Cats who want to breed me and use me for their perverse pleasures.
A freak of nature, the humans don't want me.
Far more valuable than they could ever know, the Cats don't appreciate me.
Lost in the conflict between two galactic empires, the pirates can't save me.
Amidst interstellar war, the Earth Defense Council never saw me coming.

Join Angel in her sexy, insane adventures with alien warriors, space pirates, and scheming Earth politicians. Rejected by humans and despised by the alien Cats who kidnapped her, can Angel find love and freedom and escape a war that threatens all of humanity?
Grab your copy of this sizzling hot box set from a New York Times bestseller!
description: "It is hot, it is steamy and it is a crazy train, hop on and enjoy the ride."
"Angel is a surprising spit-fire of a genetic creation...a rare breed."
Jennifer Cothran - Moments in West Florida Book Blog
"If you like your Sci-Fi naughty and gory then this series is one hell of a wild ass adventure you won't want to miss out on."
Ariel Mathis - Always Love Me Some Books Blog
"A bloody erotic adventure... A modern day Barbarella filled with adventure, steamy sex and scifi intrigue."
Joseph Murphy - Author of the Activation Series
serial at its modern best in the scifi genre."
If you'd like to be notified of new releases, special sales,and get FREE ebooks, join the Readers Group: smarturl.it/ReadersGroup

The story of Angel 6.0 starts with a simple girl living a sheltered life on Nugene station. Genetically engineered to reach the fullest potential of the human race, Angel must learn to adapt quickly when she's abducted by ruthless slave traders. Enslaved as concubine to an alien warlord, Angel is thrust into the mess of interplanetary politics and used as a pawn in the power struggle between space pirates, the Earth Defense Council, and greedy alien traders. Enjoy this thrilling, sexy, steamy ride across the galaxy with the perfectly engineered Angel 6.0 in her struggle to survive and find love amidst corruption, war, and the perverse men and aliens who want Angel for their own reasons. Explore the darkest parts of human nature, the dangers of alien sex rituals, and learn the true potential for human greatness ...
